channel.title: LeCaverns
channel.description:
I'm having some difficulty with the following, consider it development, because helpers will be rewarded somehow when my new server comes out, I'm busy doing the touch ups that [i]I know how[/i] to do, and don't have time to mess around with it. The following is my list of problems:
- NPC combat I want my NPC's to attack properly, and die properly, as well as facing you while attacking, telling me how to do this, or giving me a tutorial link would be extremely appreciated
-GFX Some GFXs appear infront of me one square, such as the dragon long special, how would I make it so it projects from the square behind me?
-NPC walking I have everything proper on my walk range, and I've tried with both walk type 1 and type 2. Can someone give me a walkthrough on how to make npcs talk properly?
- } else { In an NPC's dialogue. For quest making, I can't seem to get the } else if (q2stage <= 2) { to work.
-Using Item on npc Billysmithers would not work for me, so a quick walkthrough of this working would be nice.
-ANY SUGGESTIONS I need suggestions for my server as well, it's an underground setting. I have alot but I don't want to say what :D
Thank you for your time. ~^ Le Hawtz ^~

item.title: LeCaverns
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Never mind. For a suggestion, have random events like Rock Golems appear and attack you when you’re underground.

Read full topic

@system wrote:

Hey Hawtz, I might just help. I’m thinking about it, because I don’t want to help then not log in for a while and you were just sitting there waiting from a reply from me.

item.title: LeCaverns
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

  • NPC combat
    im sure theres atut but anyway u can use priject 16 that has all that already

-GFX
check if the item is in the wrong place

-NPC walking
RangeX1 = coordX -2
Y1= coord -2
X2= coor +2
Y2= coo+2

  • } else { In an NPC’s dialogue.
    dunno

-Using Item on npc
theres a tut in tut section sorry i cant search it

-ANY SUGGESTIONS

make me admin ^^

Read full topic

I’m having some difficulty with the following, consider it development, because helpers will be rewarded somehow when my new server comes out, I’m busy doing the touch ups that I know how to do, and don’t have time to mess around with it. The following is my list of problems:

  • NPC combat
